r4np 0.2.11
  • Reference

Top 250 movies ranked on IMDb

Source: R/data.R
imdb_top_250.Rd

A dataset containing details about the top 250 movies ranked on IMDb.

imdb_top_250

Format

A data frame with 250 rows and 16 variables:

title

Movie title

rank

Overall rank on IMDb

year

Year the movie was published

runtime_min

Runtime of the movie in minutes

imdb_rating

Rating from imdb, ranges from 1-10

metascore

Metascore which is based on critics' ratings

synopsis

A short summary of the movie

director

Director of the movie

star_01

Actor/actress listed first for this movie

star_02

Actor/actress listed second for this movie

star_03

Actor/actress listed third for this movie

star_04

Actor/actress listed fourth for this movie

votes

Number of viewer votes for this movie

gross_in_m

Income generated from this movie in million dollars

genre

Genres the movie is categorised in

genre_01

First genre listed for this movie

Source

IMDb (https://www.imdb.com)
